text: Red Scorpion is a 1988 American South African Namibian action movie directed by Joseph Zito and is the first movie in the Red Scorpion series. It stars Dolph Lundgren, M. Emmet Walsh, Al White, T. P. McKenna, Carmen Argenziano. == Other websites == * * Category:1988 action movies Category:American action movies Category:South African action movies Category:Namibian movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Zito
title: Red Scorpion
